text: René Clemencic (27 February 1928 – 8 March 2022) was an Austrian composer, recorder player, harpsichordist, conductor and clavichord player.International who's who in classical music Europa Publications Limited - 2007Conductors on record John L. Holmes - 1982 "Clemencic, Rene (b. 1928). He was born in Vienna, Austria. He was director of the Capella Musica Antiqua and of the Drama Musicum in Vienna. In 1958, he founded Musica Antiqua to perform early music. In 1968, he founded the Clemencic Consort. Clemencic died on 8 March 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian composers Category:Austrian conductors Category:Musicians from Vienna Category:Writers from Vienna
title: René Clemencic
